name: Kaleidoscope Consulting Group
tagline: Web Development | Graphic Design | Social Media
description:
Kaleidoscope Consulting Group is a full service web development, graphic design and social media marketing firm in Los Angeles.
We help our clients design logos, letterhead, brochures, billboards and more for their businesses across the country. In addition, we help with website design, website programming and social media marketing and consulting.
If greater online exposure is what you need, then Kaleidoscope Consulting Group can help clients with Search Engine Optimization (SEO).
